Projects.title: Leprosy Analyzer
Projects.description_short: The leprosy Analyzer is a Python-based project designed to assist medical professionals in the analysis and detection of leprosy, a chronic infectious disease caused by Mycobacterium laprae. This project leverages the power of computer vision and image processing techniques to aid in the early diagnosis and treatment of leprosy

Projects.title: My Personal Web Portfolio
Projects.description_short: A personal portfolio website made with React Vite using TailwindCss. My Personal and professional details like skills, education, projects, experiences are added here. Hosted on NETLIFY
